General.Name: Tianjin Songjiang Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Troila Information Technology Co.,Ltd. develops and sells real estate properties in China. It provides residential real estate, including high-rise buildings, multi-storey houses, and villas; and commercial real estate, including shops, office buildings, and apartments. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Songjiang Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tianjin Troila Information Technology Co.,Ltd. in September 2022. Tianjin Troila Information Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Tianjin, China.
